import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' export default function NewAlbum() { let [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const [album, setAlbum] = useState({ title: "", artist: "", year: 0, gender: "" }) const handleChange = e => { setAlbum({ ...album, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) console.log(album) } let {title, artist, year, gender} = album const handleSubmit = () => { //validaciÃ³n de los datos console.log(title) console.log(artist) console.log(year) console.log(gender) if (title==='' || artist==='' || year==='' || gender==='') { alert('Complete todos los campos') return } var json={ "title": title, "artist": artist, "year": parseInt(year), "gender": gender } //consulta const requestInit = { method: 'POST', headers: {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}, body: JSON.stringify(json) } fetch('http://localhost:9000/album/api/save', requestInit) .then(response => { if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Network response was not ok'); } return response.json(); }) .then(data => { console.log(data); alert('Album Creado') return }) .catch(error => { console.error('Fetch error:', error); }); //reiniciando state setAlbum({title: "", artist: "", year: 0, gender: ""}) } function closeModal() { setIsOpen(false) } function openModal() { setIsOpen(true) } return ( <>
Crear Album
) }
